name: Student
text: It's freezing today! Do you know any good indoor places on campus to study?

name: You
text: Yeah, the Hicks Undergraduate Library is really cozy. Have you been there?

name: Student
text: I have, but I usually go to the WALC. Iâ€™ll check out Hicks next time!

name: You
text: Great choice! It's nice and quiet, perfect for studying.
